message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this high-end product. I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to let it go for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $9000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. However, $9500 is still a bit lower than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counteroffer at $11000.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. However, $10000 is still a bit lower than I'm looking for. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counteroffer at $11250.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $9800?
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll counteroffer at $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm at my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $9500. This is my final offer.
